OnBoarding.descOne: Simply select your preferred location to get started, and discover top-rated providers and a wide selection of services available in your area.
OnBoarding.descTwo: Choose the service you need and the expert provider you trust, all in just a few clicks.
OnBoarding.descThree: Enjoy the flexibility to check real-time availability and book your appointment at a time that works best for you.

HOME.setupDescription: Complete these steps to start offering your services and products to customers
HOME.setupBusinessDesc: Add your business information, location, and photos
HOME.setupAvailabilityDesc: Configure your business hours and schedule
HOME.setupPayoutDesc: Add your payment information to receive earnings

CreateBusiness.heading: Create Business Profile
CreateBusiness.fillAllFields: Please fill in all required fields
CreateBusiness.startTypingToSearch: Start typing to search for a location
CreateBusiness.locationHint: Enter your business address. We'll use this to help customers find you.
CreateBusiness.locationDefaultNote: Default location set to Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. You can update this later when Mapbox is integrated.
CreateBusiness.availabilityIntro: When is this listing available for booking? Start by setting a default weekly schedule. After that you can adjust the availability for specific dates.
CreateBusiness.availabilityDescription: Set your regular business hours for each day of the week
CreateBusiness.overlappingSlots: Time slots cannot overlap. Please adjust your times.
CreateBusiness.endTimeBeforeStart: End time must be after start time.
CreateBusiness.exceptionsDescription: Add special dates when your business will be closed or have different hours
